page.title: 18LEEK BRITANNIA BUILDING SOC.
page.content: Leek is the home of the Britannia Building Society.Its Headquarters is on the Cheddleton Road.It has changed a lot in the last 5 years;abrand new office has opened in Derby Street on the pot where the old Leek Baths used to be.They now have the latest computerised system which is a lot quicker.It started in 1856 with assets of only &3,000; today they are worth as much as &3 billion!Many people in Leek work in its offices.There are more than 240 branches nationwide.The Britannia has over 27,000 investment accounts;that is more than one for each man,woman and child in the town itself.
